title: Delaware Water Gap National Recreation Area: Download Permit Applications
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations     Download Permit Applications                Download Permit Applications       A permit is required for all of the following activities. A $50 application fee is required to consider any permit request except for baptisms and First Amendment activities.You must allow sufficient time for the park to process your request; check with the park for guidelines.  Film, Photography & Sound Recording Permits This category requires a special permit. Additional fees, such as location fees and monitoring fees, may be applicable, depending on the project.   Commercial Film/Still Photography Special Use Permit Application, short form (37 KB pdf) Commercial Film/Still Photography Special Use Permit Application, long form (41 KB pdf)  Weddings, Baptisms, First Amendment Activities, and Competitive Events These categories use the basic special use permit.    Special Use Permit Application, short form (42 KB pdf) Special Use Permit Application, long form (39 KB pdf)  For More Information For more information about permits, call (570) 426-2440 or email the park's Special Use Coordinator.
